reviewText: First, I got this before I saw Negima!? but after seeing Negima!. Try not to make the same mistake. ;p  This is only two extra episodes essentially, made as spring/summer specials. They stand alone well, but I'm not sure the price was right... at $10-12 they would be worth it without a doubt. Watch the second series (Negima!?) first, characterizations change somewhat from the first series.
Title: Negima!? Spring and Summer Specials

reviewText: This dvd is loaded with fan service... cleavage abounds as Negi interacts with his students in this hilarious addition to the Negima!? series... much more entertaining that the first season of the series.
Title: Negima!? Spring and Summer Specials

reviewText: Negi and his girls go on a seaside vacation. After accidentally seeing Asuna naked, Negi is depressed about her being mad at him. The other girls come up with a silly plan to reconcile them. After that, They all go to a spa resort. Nothing important happens. Nodoka spends most of her time wit Negi while the other girls try to get his attention away from her.This special is fun, but that's about it. It's rated TV MA. I think that's overdoing it a bit. It's just a bunch of girls in towels and bathing suits, with an occasional suggestive scene or 2. This should really be TV 14. It's everything you expect from Negima!? Just a little more risque.
Title: Negima!? Spring and Summer Specials

reviewText: This collection features the spring and summer specials. Anyone who reads the mangas will recognize the first episode because it animates the time Negi and Asuna have their big fight there where she won't forgive him. Of course a few things are added to it as well since it is using the animation from the second series, like a chupacabra hunt and skydiving. The second episode was something completely new to me, where Nodoka and Negi are stuck together by a red thread and they have to make it through the day. Both episodes a pretty good I'd say, with some great scenes featuring Zazie being awesome, though these episodes rely heavily on the fan service.Comes in a standard 15mm dvd case, trailers, and the audio plays in stereo. It has both the japanese and english dubs, but I wouldn't recommend anyone to watch in the english dub because in my opinion, it is pretty bad.
Title: Negima!? Spring and Summer Specials

reviewText: A fan of the series. :] this is a must to have in you're collection. It arrived in a timely fashion with no scratches or damage of any kind. :]
Title: Negima!? Spring and Summer Specials

reviewText: Though this is only a 2 episode OVA, it is far superior to the original negima anime, in the animation department. It is done by the animation studio SHAFT, which really makes this OVA look great, beautiful, and caters a bit more to those who enjoy fan service, and they do it well. Its definitely awesome if you already like the Negima manga or anime.
Title: Negima!? Spring and Summer Specials

reviewText: It is a short story of Negimai and his girls.  it set in summer time where went  beach and have fun.  it is nice but it is less then an hour long.
Title: Negima!? Spring and Summer Specials

reviewText: I got this based on being the same creator as love hina I was curious,the story starts out as a young wizard who is skilled beyond his age that takes a job as a college professor and how he must deal with the every day being picked onr for his age and height.its heart warming and touching.Negimal takes on a rowdy class in the end he is loved and adored by all he shows heart and do anything to help his students in their every day life yes it can get kinda perverted with the actions of the charaters but its funny entertaining and sweet.How negimal takes the good and bad and truly amazing to his students this is worth buying I recomend the complete seris tho I enjoy watching this alot its up there with love hina this is I think better or same level as the other seris
summary: if u luved love hina u will love this seris too
Title: Negima!? Spring and Summer Specials

reviewText: Let me start off by saying that I love the "Second Season" of Negima.This, however, contrasts that in one aspect...fan service. While the Second Season wasn't about fan service & focused more on the comedy aspect, this focused a little more towards the fan service BUT it was equally focused on the comedy as well. All in all: good buy. Funny. No nudity. Swimsuits galore. Not for kids. Enjoy
Title: Negima!? Spring and Summer Specials
